articles.author: David Phelan
articles.title: Apple Adds Unexpected Free Upgrade For All iPhone 12 Users - Forbes
articles.description: With zero fanfare, it seems that Apple has just added a useful boost to the iPhone 12 series.
articles.content: When Apple released iOS 17.4 in the first week of March, it made no mention of an upgrade to wireless charging capabilities in the iPhone 12. According to Macworld, it seems that since the software w… [+2576 chars]
